page.title: 10WIMBLEBALL RESERVOIR
page.content: Sailing on the lake is controlled by the Wimbleball sailing club which has a clubhouse on the west side of the lake near Cowlings. Boardsailing, canoeing and model boating are also controlled by the club. A rowing club has also been formed and a 1500m rowing course is planned, regattas are expected to be regular events. During the fishing season a temporary tent and motor camp site is available at Cowlings with water supply and toilets. Camping permits (Â£1 per night can be obtained from the Warden at Cowlings).
